metadata.title: CVE-2019-10052 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Suricata 4.1.3. If the network packet does nothave the right length, the parser tries to access a part of a DHCP packet.At this point, the Rust environment runs into a panic inparse_clientid_option in the dhcp/parser.rs file.

criterions.comment: suricata: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
